body:
Your 2021 home of **LIVE WTA Rankings**. We're so excited to bring these to you. Created by our winning sports betting model, and updated every single day. Find out the exact order of WTA players, in real time, across three surfaces. That's right, we've intentionally separated our ratings across grass, clay and hardcourt. As you know, they is a big difference between each track and you have to be Serena Williams to dominate every surface. Without further ado. - - - ## **Live WTA Rankings** ## **Hardcourt WTA Rankings** The most common surface on the WTA Tour and one to watch as we get close to the US Open.
- - - ## **Grass WTA Rankings** Barty dominated these rankings before winning Wimbledon 2021. What an animal. Go Australia.
- - - ## **Clay WTA Rankings**
- - - ### **Want more insight? Join the weekly email.** ### **We promise it's worth your time.** ### **
** - - - ## **More Tennis Resources** We have one tennis resource that you must check every day: * **[Tennis Predictions Today](https://www.betrefinery.com/tennis-betting/tennis-predictions-today)** This expert sports betting model was created by a full time sports bettor. It provides outputs for every tournament. From dodgy Challengers to Wimbledon.
title: Live WTA Rankings: Your Ratings Authority
seoTitle: Live WTA Rankings: Your Ratings Authority
description: Do you want WTA Rankings from a professional sports betting model? Then you're in the right place. Bet Refinery has the most accurate WTA Rankings on the web. Across grass, hardcourt and clay surfaces.
